# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G Victores 2012 @ UC3M

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

IF (ENABLE_textToSpeech)

file(GLOB bash_scripts ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/*.sh)

yarp_install(PROGRAMS ${bash_scripts} DESTINATION bin)  # yarp helper copies into build; program sets +x

ENDIF (ENABLE_textToSpeech)
